title: disconnectOrderItemDetail
description: A request by an organization (buyer) to  another ogranization (seller) to disconnect an existing order.

objectType.description: The type of the object, disconnectOrderItem.

sellerNetworkIdentifier.description: One of the following Seller-assigned values may be included: OVC Identifier, EVC Identifier, UNI Identifier, ENNI Identifier.

buyerNetworkIdentifier.description: One of the following Buyer-assigned values may be included: Buyer OVC Identifier, Buyer EVC Identifier, Buyer UNI Identifier, Buyer ENNI Identifier.
